Stool: Intestinal hemorrhage; blood dark, fluid, non-coagulable
Blood oozes from rectum when standing or walking
Head: Vertigo, with weakness and trembling
Dull heavy occipital pain, on right side and right eye
Headache with pain in heart on lying on left side
Headache; must walk on tip-toe to avoid jarring
Fever: Malignant fevers of a hemorrhagic or putrescine character
Stomach: Cannot lie on right side, without vomiting dark-green matter
Unable to retain anything; violent vomiting of food; bilious vomiting, vomiting of blood
Trembling, fluttering feeling below the epigastrium
Hungry, craves stimulants, sugar; averse to meat
Cancer of stomach with vomiting of bloody, slimy mucus
Constant nausea and vomiting every month, after menstruation
Mouth: Tongue fiery red, dry in center, smooth and polished
Tongue red and small, but feels swollen
Spasmodic grinding of teeth at night
Tongue when protruding goes to right
Respiratory: Tickling from a dry spot in larynx
Eyes: Ciliary neuralgia; tearing, boring pain, as if a cut had been made around eyes
For absorption of intraocular hemorrhages, into the vitreous, but particularly for non-inflammatory retinal hemorrhages
Feeling of stoppage in right ear
Very sensitive to light, especially lamp light
Nose: Epistaxis, blood black and stringy, ozaena, after exanthemata or syphilis
Modalities: Worse: right side; open air; evening and morning; in spring
Worse: coming on of warm weather; yearly; on awaking; damp and wet; jar
Mind: Weeping mood; clouded perception and memory; impatient
Female: Dysmenorrhoea; pain extends down thighs, with aching in region of heart
Sensation as though uterus would drop out
Uterine hemorrhage with faintness at stomach
Skin: Yellow color of the whole body
Boils, carbuncles, and eruptions are surrounded by purplish, mottled skin and oedema
Hemorrhages from every part of body
Great sensitiveness of skin of right half of body
Swelling and discoloration, skin tense and shows every tint of color, with excruciating pain
Throat: Spasm of oesophagus; cannot swallow any solid substance
Extremities: Lower extremities go to sleep easily

name: Crotalus horridus
Relationship: Antidote: LACH.; ALCOHOL. Radiant heat; camphor.Compare: BOTHROPS; NAJA (more nervous phenomena); LACHESIS (more markedly wore on left side); ELAPS (preferable in otorrhoea and affections of right lung); CROTALUS CASCAVELLA (thoughts and dreams of death. Paralysis of articulation, embarrassed stertorous breathing and semi-consciousness. A magnetic state is produced; cutting sensation all around eyeball.) BUNGARUS - KRAIT - (poliomyelitis).
details: Snake poisons are supposed to be chemically CAN. HYDRATES of Soda and other salts. Alcohol is the natural solvent of these salts and is an antidote. Has a profound trophic action. Old age nutritional troubles. Low septic states. General disorganization of the blood, Hemorrhages and jaundice. A crotalin injection decreases the rate of coagulation of the blood. In epilepsy the average rate is far greater than in normal conditions. Blood decomposition, HEMORRHAGES (dark fluid that forms no clots), tendency to carbuncles, malignant scarlatina, YELLOW FEVER, the plague, cholera, give opportunity to use this remedy. HEMORRHAGIC DIATHESIS. Acts as a sedative. Sleeps into his symptoms. More right-sided in its action.
